emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Grace Memorial Presbyterian Church basketball players, front row from left: David Cook, William Hicks, Alfred Hunt, Joe Baber and Crocker; back row: coach Joe Baber, Nolan, Ronald Moon, C. Paige, and  Walter Boon, posed in Herron Hill gym
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 25, 1950, pg. 21 reads: "Crack Cagers - Members of the Grace Memorial basketball team, one of the best clubs in district are shown in the above picture. From left to right they are, back row: Joe Baber, coach; Nolan, Ronald Moon, C. Paige, Walter Boon.  Front row: David Cook, William Hicks, Alfred Hunt, Joe Baber and Crocker.  Missing from the picture are Earl Hord Jr. and William Terrell. - Harris Photo."
